data.name: Stalin vs. Martians
data.detailed_description:
Stalin vs. Martians, as the name suggests, is a game both masterfully trashy and absolutely over-the-top. Fun and accessible, it takes a simple arcade-like approach to the genre of real-time strategy. The player controls the Red Army, as it defends Earth from the Martian Invasion of 1942, that highly classified military operation which even today remains a closely guarded state secret. Stalin himself conducts the mission briefings, and later even becomes a playable unit. The bold leader is duly serious, even as he faces the most ridiculous threat the world has ever known.

The game itself is far from standard RTS fare: this is no realistic and deeply strategic war simulation, but a straightforward, fun and light-hearted arcade-style game - complete with power-ups falling from conquered foes in the form of bright shiny coins.

  • Unique concept and design.
  • Fast-paced and lighthearted arcade-style real-time strategy, with power-ups, coin-collection and speedy reinforcements.
  • Accessible and fun, well suited even for people who don't normally play strategy games.
  • A single-player campaign of 12 missions.
  • Incredible Russian soundtrack and wild music-video intermissions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Supported OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz or Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM (2048 MB recommended)
  • Graphics: 3D card with 128 MB VRAM (256 MB recommended)
  • Hard Drive: At least 2 GB of free space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • DirectX® Version DirectX 9.0

  • Notes: Currently the game is compatible with the following graphic cards: NVidia GeForce 6/7/8/9 series, ATI Radeon 9600/X1xxx, AMD Radeon HD 2xxx series, Matrox Parhelia.
  • In case of problems with ATI graphic cards please install the latest drivers. We do not guarantee the correct performance for the laptop versions of these cards. We do not guarantee the correct performance on any graphic cards, except the ones mentioned above.
